MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH4 postcode area of Penymyndd, affecting properties in Old Hope Road and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work of required following third party damage to the overhead cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:57PM  on 5TH November 2020.
